data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yoshino, Hiroki, Ohsawa, Takeshi A. (2019): Description of new species of algal-boring Limnoria (Crustacea, Isopoda, Limnoriidae) from Japan and redescription of Limnoria segnoides Menzies, 1957 and L. nagatai Nunomura, 2012. Zootaxa 4550 (2): 236-250, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4550.2.5|15 occurrences
